questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and buildings
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) In a residential area
C) At the beach
D) Inside a museum

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) People walking
B) Buildings with colorful shutters
C) Animals playing
D) Art exhibits

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A building with shutters
C) A group of people
D) A statue

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A row of buildings
C) A lake
D) A mountain

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A stone wall and gravel path
B) A playground
C) A car
D) A garden

A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and white
C) Green and white
D) Black and brown

B) Large glass windows
C) Small square windows
D) Sliding windows

B) Clear with some clouds
C) Completely cloudy
D) Stormy with lightning

D) Red
